description:
Cake PHP is one of the most popular PHP frameworks and powers numerous websites worldwide. If you are new to PHP and are looking for a framework to quickly build a complete dynamic website and web service then CakePHP is just tailor made for you. Easy to learn and powerful to use this tool can help you build almost any web app you can think of. With clean conventions and built in security you can easily focus on your App logic. Cake PHP offers powerful Software design patterns and controllers with simple and quick configuration and setup making it an awesome tool even for a beginner.

Our course on Cake PHP focuses on the application of this tool in creating real world applications. You will go through all the concepts and building blocks of the framework making you well skilled with the tool. You will also create a complete web application from scratch to help you build on the topics covered under the course.

So join us now and start building powerful distributed web applications using CakePHP.
title: Learn to Build Web Apps Using Cake PHP
